channel.title: How can I achieve this?
channel.description: Hey. So how can I make a game frame similar to RuneScape where there is a solid frame all around and the actual game view is located in a specific area. I'd like to know if it's possible to do this by putting the game on a JPanel that is within the game's JFrame

item.title: How can I achieve this?
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

[quote=“wildskiller, post:8, topic:544970”][quote author=Limits link=topic=663849.msg4437184#msg4437184 date=1405478878]

I use a canvas, but everyone has their preferences.

I swapped to a canvas. Does it work for you?
[/quote]
Yes, just as I edited in my post, you can use a buffer strategy.[/quote]
Aha! Got it working, thank you!

Read full topic

item.title: How can I achieve this?
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

[quote=“Limits, post:7, topic:544970”][quote author=wildskiller link=topic=663849.msg4437181#msg4437181 date=1405478756]
I use a canvas, but everyone has their preferences.
[/quote]
I swapped to a canvas. Does it work for you?[/quote]
Yes, just as I edited in my post, you can use a buffer strategy.

item.title: How can I achieve this?
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

I use a canvas, but everyone has their preferences.

To use a JPanel, just override the paint(Graphics) method and add it to the window. You could create a buffer strategy using the Canvas class and add it to the window.

Read full topic

item.title: How can I achieve this?
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

Justin Bieber:

It’s all done by your own rendering code within the panel surely? JFrame just represents the window…

It renders onto the JFrame and the JFrame class has methods that the JPanel class does not.

Read full topic

item.title: How can I achieve this?
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

ohokay:

Yes that’s how you do it, the applet/game goes into a JPanel which is added to the frame

May you please explain or give an example to how that is done? My brain is fried, I’ve been trying for an hour

Read full topic
